items.name: Bitter Lake
items.desc:
Bitter lake is our homage to a classic beer style loved the world over that has been fundamental to many of our journeys through beer!
Bitter Lake is a dank, piney west coast pale ale with a classic blend of new & old school hops.
Supported by a malt base that delivers a crisp and clean profile, this stripped back and dry base helps to enhance and deliver a classic west coast hop profile which gracefully fades to a refreshing bitterness

items.name: Double Nelson Fog DIPA
items.desc: A DIPA showcasing one of our favourite NZ hops; Nelson Sauvin! Extra pale, Dextrin, Chit & maize make up the grist for a soft malt profile. Whirpool and dry hop additions of Nelson Sauvin brings out its characteristic aromas of fresh crushed white grape & gooseberry.

items.name: First Light Grapefruit West Coast IPA
items.desc: First Light is a grapefruit West Coast IPA with a hop bill delivering aromatic pine, orange, citrus and tropical fruit, supported by a crisp and dry malt base that leads to a refreshing bitterness.

items.name: Solar Point Summer Pale
items.desc: Super Pale, Chit & Oats make up the grist, whirlpooled and dry hopped extensively with Meridian hops for their tropical & berry forward backbone with distinct citrus aromas.

items.name: The Pieces Fit IPA
items.desc: Super Pale, chit & oats give a soft, smooth base and a platform for a whirlpool charge of Lemondrop, followed by a dry hop schedule of BRU-1, Sultana & Sabro which give the beer distinct tropical fruit aromas of bright citrus, pineapple and coconut.
